EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Agile Series #2 - US - 2014.08.26.Email - Last Call - US
EmailTemplate.subject: Agile Webinar Tomorrow: Moving from Chaos to Quality
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Agile Webinar Series: Moving from Chaos to Quality
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Megan Maloney, QA Manager, IT Solution Delivery at CFA Institute, discusses how her testing organization was able to move from chaos to quality in less than a year using Tricentis Tosca Testsuite. Hear how they were able to implement these quality improvements:
- Automate testing to achieve truly agile development - Optimize risk coverage - Speed time to market
Michael Eckhoff, Senior VP of Worldwide Sales at Tricentis, will host the webinar.
Please contact us <mailto:webinar@tricentis.com> with any questions or concerns. Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-agile-series-2-us-2014-08-26.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal>
Did you miss Webinar #1: Testing at the Speed of Agile, featuring Diego Lo Giudice from Forrester Research?
Click here <http://www.slideshare.net/tricentis> to view slides from the webcast.
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-agile-series-2-us-2014-08-26.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal> Tue Aug 26, 2014 10:00 a.m. – 11:00 a.m. PDT 1:00 p.m. – 2:00 p.m. EDT
Megan Maloney QA Manager, IT Solution Delivery CFA Institute
Michael Eckhoff Senior VP of Worldwide Sales Tricentis
